ctx: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hnonzero.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, a0, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a0 b H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 b nZb p q) r Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p) Hnonzero : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a1 : Term A n p0 : list (Term A n) H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H4 : a1 = b H5 : p0 = q H3 : exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H2 :: P = Q Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ?M2241 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 ?M2231 eqA invA minusA multA divA ?M2239 n ?M2241 ?M2242 a b ?M2246 ?M2247 ?M2248)) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 ?M2231 eqA invA minusA multA divA ?M2239 n ?M2241 ?M2242 a b ?M2246 ?M2247 ?M2248))" with "reduce (exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H2 :: P) (mults multA (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p)) (mults multA (n:=n) a r)".

ctx: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hnonzero.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, a0, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a0 b H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 b nZb p q) r Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p) Hnonzero : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a1 : Term A n p0 : list (Term A n) H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H4 : a1 = b H5 : p0 = q H3 : exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H2 :: P = Q Unable to unify "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" with "reduce (exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H2 :: P) (mults multA (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p)) (mults multA (n:=n) a r)".

ctx: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hnonzero.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hnonzero.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, a0, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a0 b H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 b nZb p q) r Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p) Hnonzero : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a a1 : poly A0 eqA ltM p0 : list (Term A n) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H2 : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) P H3 : p0 = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q H4 : a1 :: P = Q Unable to unify "inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q" with "reduce (a1 :: P) (mults multA (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p)) (mults multA (n:=n) a r)".

original: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanonical Hnonzero. induction Hreduce. - inversion H. apply canonical_spminusf_full_t with (a:=a) (b:=b) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA). + apply cs. + apply H. - apply reduceskip. -
